name: Design Sprint Framework
description:
“The ‘greatest hits’ of business strategy, innovation, behavioural science, and more — packaged into a step-by-step process that any team can use.”

- Jake Knapp


This template will help you quickly come up with design sprint plans for your stakeholders. A proven design delivery template that we have used at mobileLIVE over the years. Ready to use responsive elements that can be replaced easily to make design delivery estimation of your choice.


The current template file includes

  • mobileLIVE Design Sprint framework adapted from the design sprint model but stretches over 3 weeks
  • AJ and Smart version of Design Sprint (https://designsprint.academy/design-sprint-3-0/)



Don't forget to read the "How to use this file?" page for more details and how to take the maximum advantage of this template.
